title: kanjadaLAyatAkSi
sahitya:
kanjadaLAyatAkSi kAmAkSi kamalA manOhari tripurasundari


anupallavi

 kunjara gamanE maNi maNDita manjuLa caranE 
mAmavashiva panjarashuki pankajamukhi guruguha ranjani niranjani durita bhanjani


caraNam   rAkA shashi vadanE suradanE rakSita madanE ratna sadanE 
shrI kAncana vasanE surasanE shrNgArAshraya mandahasanE 
EkAnEkAkSari bhuvanEshvari EkAnandAmrtajhari bhAsvari 
EkAgra manOlayakari shrIkari EkAmrEsha grhEshvari shankari
